column1: typical 3in1 Creator box wir the formula car as main build, a go kart as second and a speed boat as third.
Nothing special except the nose tail. This is curently exclusive to this set. It is a very nice Part especially for moc'
Very straight forward with no surprise for me. I think very good for kids.
Splendid little Formula car with nice color scheme and V4 engine. Very fun to swoosh around in them floor. The scale is good to. In my opinion okay a little to Bug for minifigs.

column2: recommend buyng the Set for kids and carfans. I added a driver with a racing suit(white, black or light blue) recommended and helmet for better play.
